attributes.additional_details: This petition calls for the reduction of tuition fees for students entering higher education to its previous level of £3375 rather than the incoming £9000, in order to maintain the UK's competitiveness in producing highly skilled and educated graduates, maintain the high standard of university research and prevent those wishing to expand their horizons from being left with crippling debts.This petition would seek to advance the movement towards the abolition of tuition fees altogether in the near future.
